title: Summary Plot with Multi-classification Using CatBoost
body:
shap.summary_plot(shap_values[:,:-1,:-1], features=X_test, plot_type='dot')

Running the above code gives me the following error: (I have 7 classes and I built the model with CatBoost)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
IndexError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-256-871a2617d7d7> in <module>
----> 1 shap.summary_plot(shap_values[:,:-1,:-1], features=X_test, plot_type='dot')

C:\Anacoda\lib\site-packages\shap\plots\summary.py in summary_plot(shap_values, features, feature_names, max_display, plot_type, color, axis_color, title, alpha, show, sort, color_bar, auto_size_plot, layered_violin_max_num_bins, class_names)
    113             ind = sort_inds[i]
    114             pl.subplot(1, max_display, i + 1)
--> 115             proj_shap_values = shap_values[:, ind, sort_inds]
    116             proj_shap_values *= 2
    117             proj_shap_values[:, i] /= 2  # because only off diag effects are split in half

IndexError: index 6 is out of bounds for axis 1 with size 5

Please Help.
